name: Ruta
greetingText: If you're seeing this i finally got this thing working (´▽`ʃ♡ƪ)
wishText: I hope you get to enjoy many more years like this and we continue being friends because i think you've been a pretty pivotal person in my life and I can't take that for granted. Always remember even in the darkest times the Lord still shines. Happy Birthday Poo! Enjoy your day!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Too many many more years blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are Special like really what did i do to deserve you fr it doesn't even make sense but whatever.
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
